display.value: Lift something that weighs 4.5kg - 9.0kg (e.g. a large bag of food).
Carrying something that weighs 4.5kg - 9.0 kg (e.g. a large bag of food) from one room to another room.
Walk approximately 1 km (faster than your normal pace) without stopping.
Walk 50 steps on level ground at a normal pace without stopping.
Walk up 20 steps or two flights of stairs without stopping.
